00032 ultimix.DeleteRecord = function( Selector , Url , Prefix , NotSelectedErrorMessage , ConfirmStrign , Waiting , PackageName , PackageVersion )
00033 {
00034       var   CheckBoxSelector = '._' + Prefix + '_item_checkbox';
00035       var   DialogBoxSelector;
00036       
00037       if( ultimix.RecordSelectedEx( CheckBoxSelector ) == false )
00038       {
00039             ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( NotSelectedErrorMessage , ultimix.get_string( 'Error' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_OK | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONERROR | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL );
00040             return;
00041       }
00042       
00043       if( Waiting )
00044       {
00045             DialogBoxSelector = ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( ultimix.get_string( 'wait_please' ) , ultimix.get_string( 'Info' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONLOADING | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL );
00046       }
00047       
00048       var   Data;
00049       
00050       Data = ultimix.forms.ExtractFormData( jQuery( CheckBoxSelector ).filter( 'input:checked' ) );
00051       Data[ Prefix + '_context_action' ] = 'delete_record';
00052       Data[ Prefix + '_record_id' ] = -1;
00053       Data[ 'package_name' ] = PackageName;
00054       Data[ 'package_version' ] = PackageVersion;
00055       Data[ 'delete_' + Prefix ] = 1;
00056       Data[ 'ajaxed' ] = 1;
00057       
00058       ultimix.DirectController( 
00059             Data , 
00060             function()
00061             {
00062                   jQuery( DialogBoxSelector ).dialog( 'close' );
00063                   ultimix.ReloadGrid( Selector , true , Url );
00064             } , 
00065             { 'async' : true }
00066       );
00067 }
